Package net.vattp.security

Implements cryptographically secure random numbers.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ESecureRandom Untamed: Cryptographically Strong Random Number Generator
MicroTime Untamed: Wraps the microsecond timer aspect of Native, but works in a degenerate fashion, using pure Java's System.currentTimeMillis()*1000, if native code is unavailable.
Native A class to hold all the miscellaneous system-dependent utilities Microcosm might need.
SecureRandomCrewSeedIt  
TimerJitterEntropy Use clock phase differences between 2 PC clocks to generate entropy.
 

Package net.vattp.security Description

Implements cryptographically secure random numbers.

@author Bill Frantz
